title: Alpha client disappeared; download link?
body: Hey all, I just recently restarted my computer, and to my dismay, the Alpha Client was gone. I can't seem to find a download link to get it back, so I was curious if anybody knew where it was. Thanks!

replies.body:
It looks like the *shortcuts* for the Alpha Client are disappearing, but not the Alpha Client itself. You can find the launcher for it inside your League directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)

I hope this helped!
and now all you get is being called a child killer and permanent bugsplats
Can you try going to the normal client, not the alpha one, and then clicking the repair option? I think that fixed it for me.  But I'm not positive.
Gettign the same error, seems to be the same problem from this thread http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/R4H7rMnx-alpha-client-crash

Hi Targons. I saw that much after a couple games. However, I decided to reinstall the client anyway just in case.

Noooooow I'm at the same point King Irony's at, getting bugsplats on launch.

I'd recommend running a set of system logs using our [Hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our tech specialists can look into this further.
